title: The Duelling Cavalier
description: 100% all talking. The story of Count Pierre de Battaille and young Yvonne who find love during the French Revolution, despite the threats of Madame Guillotine.
quote: I am the saddest of mortals in France.
altHero: Lina Lamont as Yvonne in French dress with Don Lockwood in the background as the courting Count Pierre
alt1: Yvonne walks with a handful of other women, also in elaborate dress
alt3: Count Pierre is stunned after reading a letter
alt4: Yvonne is upset, facing away from another man who looks sinister
